Properties: The instance of a software to deploy/access/manipulate a research product (e.g. the instance of EVT used to visualise the Codice Pelavicino)

description: The type of service or software.
The title of the software or data service used to generate; deploy; access; or manipulate the dataset.
A summary of what the software allows users to do.
The URL of the service or software to generate; deploy; access; or manipulate the dataset. Do not include the official page of a software.
The URL of a document describing the operations; parameters etc. with respect to the dataset.
The type of research activities afforded by the service or software with respect to the dataset.
The terms under which the software or service is available.
Software component that is reused/extended in the current software. It can be a research product or the URL of the official page of the software.
